sub_title: Enjoying my job and life balance
summary:
Experienced Ops. Coordinator with a demonstrated history of working over several years in the Oil & Gas industry - Engineering related positions - in several Countries in South America and Europe. Skilled in Oil & Gas, Wireline Services Field Engineer  OH & CH, Experience in Downhole Seismic Services. Expert in Well intervention Wireline and quality assurance processes. GIT 10Kpsi trained. Onshore and Offshore. Remote locations. 

Offshore certifications on date. 

Experience in production supervision and Quality Assurance activities in the Automotive Industry.

sent by other associates.', 'title': 'Driver Support Associate', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 4334, 'name': 'Baker Hughes', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQE4CJSgGjKt_w/company-logo_400_400/0/1615928699683?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=Ko7DdG7pcW7wyAroVzb6gykMe0vHNQRgBilkr9QIeeQ', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/bakerhughes/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Provincia de Neuquén, Argentina', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Baker Hughes', 'description': 'As Wireline Field Engineer, I was responsible for the safe and correct delivery of O&G wells logging
services. Managing a crew of 3-6 members (from a pool of 60 operators), sometimes mentoring
Junior FE’s, would prepare tools and equipment for the operation assigned: functional check,
calibrations, extensive paperwork, route planning, permits, etc. Delivery of the service would consist
in acquisition, processing and presentation of geological data or mechanical services, with constant
supervision of the customer representative (geologists, engineers, company mans).
In the position as Engineer in Charge, besides the duties of WFE, I was responsible for the operation
in northern Argentina remote facility. Revenue of the operation was about 4 M USD/year.
I reported directly to the District Manager, but also to the Sales Country Manager and the Technical
Manager. Reporting to me, one CH FE, one Maintenance Engineer, 7 Operators and an
administrative clerk.
Tasks would include: tendering, budgeting and billing processes; periodic contact with the customer
(meetings, visits); preparation of special projects from a technical & operational side (like
abandonment of MdT-14 well, Mac-1004 underbalance perforation); hold the HSE and Quality
meetings; act as RPO of the facility; hold inventory controls and forecast future needs, acquisition of
consumables (guns, explosives) or services. Also participating in the weekly meetings with all country
operations, reporting sales, forecasting future operations and needs (due remote location and low
activity, logging tools were not at the site, had to be shipped from other location for the operations).
Worked in Argentina (several locations), Bolivia (several assistances and as local employee) and
Colombia (1 month assistance)
Expertise: onshore.', 'title': 'Field Engineer - WLS Neuquén', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 4334, 'name': 'Baker Hughes', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQE4CJSgGjKt_w/company-logo_400_400/0/1615928699683?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=Ko7DdG7pcW7wyAroVzb6gykMe0vHNQRgBilkr9QIeeQ', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/bakerhughes/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Santa cruz de la Sierra, Bolivia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Baker Hughes', 'description': None, 'title': 'Field Engineer - WLS (Bolivia)', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Tartagal, Salta, Argentina', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Baker Hughes', 'description': 'Engineer in Charge of Tartagal Facility. Aug 2007 – Sep 2008: Rincón de los Sauces, Neuquén, Argentina - Wireline Field Engineer Jr.', 'title': 'Field Engineer - Baker Atlas Wireline', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 430229, 'name': 'Volkswagen Argentina', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFgUCeBIeG70g/company-logo_400_400/0/1572537354350?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=g19CVgLQTPE-IPqd_k1zap3jikuLYlFc33F8zuuDlho', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/volkswagen-argentina/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Buenos Aires Province, Argentina', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'company': 'Volkswagen Group Argentina', 'description': 'In this position, I gained experience in the steel stamping process.
By that time there were 3 models being produced (Caddy, Suran & Polo) and the project Amarok
was starting (not being produced yet, only prototypes, but the whole parts development process had
started).
Depending from the Quality Assurance Sector, visiting supplier’s facilities, I was responsible for
analyzing the deviations found in the VW assembly line (parts not fixing correctly) or in the incoming
quality check process (RPS 3D measurements of parts, aspect controls, etc.) and supervise the
development of the parts for the Amarok project by helping the supplier to deliver all technical data,
process descriptions and controls, AMFE’s, etc.', 'title': 'Engineer Body Shop Parts Development', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Inergy Automotive Systems Argentina S.R.L.', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Villa Martelli, Buenos Aires, Argentina', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'company': 'Inergy Automotive Systems Argentina S.R.L.', 'description': 'This company was dedicated to produce fuel tanks (extruding and blowing process) and delivering
JIT fuel systems: the fuel tank assembled with the pump and electrical connections.
As quality coordinator, I was responsible for the internal quality checks (product audit), analyzing
process deviations, preparing quality data for the tendering processes (ANPQP), reporting locally
quality metrics to customers and management, control of documentation (production records, quality
check records, incoming material traceability, etc.) and oversee the implementation and functionality of
the ISO TS 16949 QMS.', 'title': 'Coordinador de Calidad', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 773635, 'name': 'Mercedes-Benz en Argentina', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQGbU8lNGHD5HA/company-logo_400_400/0/1688752316350?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=hpLKq29tWovdly3aErny21iVvRGvlfuKsxvJV8kF0g0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/mercedes-benz-argentina/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Buenos Aires, Argentina', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'company': 'Mercedes-Benz Argentina', 'description': 'In this position I had 3 principal tasks:
1) Perform QMS audits on vendors: Annually all suppliers would be visited by the quality team and
an audit of their QMS would take place using the standards ISO 9001 – ISO TS 16949 – VDA 6.3.
I’ve learned about many different production processes, from steel stamping, tires manufacturing,
electronics assemblies, wiring harness production, coating processes, etc.
2) Keep the company’s QMS running: perform internal quality system and process audits, keep the
quality manual updated, load in the QMS internal site all the procedures and work instructions from
all company sectors (control of documentation), train the local sectors quality representatives and
help them keep all the information on date. All this was meant to prepare the QMS for the external
audit – recertification process. For this, I came to learn about all the manufacturing process of the
car, from BIW, Paint and Montage. (FYI the models produced were van Sprinter and Buses chassis)
3) Special projects: As per the headquarters in Stuttgart, Germany directed, implementation of new
methods, systems, control, etc. Also the NCV3 project (replacement of the Sprinter model) with all
the plant redesign, processes adequations and a lot of new work instructions. Another task was to
track internally all manufacturing quality issues found in the export process, looking in the
manufacturing record of every unit (FBK) and analyze if the damage should be covered by the
insurance.', 'title': 'QA Auditor', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Implantes Fico S.R.L.', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2002}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2003}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Villa Ballester, Buenos Aires, Argentina', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2002}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2003}}, 'company': 'Implantes Fico S.R.L.', 'description': 'Quality Management Intern. 

Deployment and maintenance of standard ISO 9001 QMS.', 'title': 'Pasante Aseguramiento de Calidad', 'employment_type': 'Apprenticeship'}]}]
